entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who is being addressed by Mrs. Weasley and his brothers Fred and George.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as the one who is talking to Ron and giving him a kiss on the cheek.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as one of Ron's brothers, who is teasing Ron with his brother George.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as one of Ron's brothers, who is teasing Ron with his brother Fred.

relationships.description: Mrs. Weasley gives Ron a kiss on the cheek, as mentioned in the text: 'She gave Ron yet another kiss on the cheek...'
Fred is teasing Ron with his brother George, as mentioned in the text: 'You don't mind if we don't kiss you, do you, Ron?'
George is teasing Ron with his brother Fred, as mentioned in the text: 'We could curtsy, if you like...'
